effects: Increase ATK and DEF by 80% for 3 turns to all allies
Increase resistance to all elements by 45% for 3 turns to all allies
name: Divine Veil

desc_short.0: Boost ATK, DEF, fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance for all allies
desc_short.5: Aumenta el ATQ, la DEF y la res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad de todos los aliados
